title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 41 - Standards Of Brake Efficiency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 41 - Standards Of Brake Efficiency

State Regulations
§ 41.1 - Service brake standard
§ 41.2 - Auxiliary (hand) brake standard

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 41

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 214, 375[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
